title: Depth Chart Overhaul: Bowling-Type Positions & All-Rounder Scoring
description: Replaced generic bowling positions with 6 type-specific positions (right_arm_pace, left_arm_pace, off_spin, leg_spin, left_arm_spin, middle_overs_specialist). All-rounders compete in batting positions with zero penalty. Founder XII +10 boost. Overseas dependency softened (threshold ≥3). Display split into Batting/Bowling sections with variety badges. Hardik Pandya now correctly appears in MI middle-order.

florentino_gate.reason: Core depth chart restructure required for editorial accuracy

domain_sanity.notes: All 10 teams x 13 positions validated. Hardik Pandya correctly in MI middle-order.

founder_validation.notes: Depth chart overhaul verified across all teams
